_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: CustomAI
author: ldt@legacyh.dev
description: A self-hosted AI assistant with WebSockets, running on https://ai.core-x.dev and wss://aiip.core-x.dev

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# 
# .____     ___________________
# |    |    \______ \__    ___/
# |    |     |    |  \|    |   
# |    |___  |    `   \    |   
# |_______ \/_______  /____|   
#         \/        \/         
# 
# Website: https://legacyh.dev
# Discord: https://discord.legacyh.dev
# Issues:  https://github.com/LegacyAngel2K9/Pelican-Eggs/issues
# 

apt update && apt install -y python3 python3-venv python3-pip sqlite3 curl git
python3 -m venv ~/ai_env
source ~/ai_env/bin/activate
pip install flask flask_sqlalchemy flask_socketio eventlet torch transformers
mkdir -p /home/container/ai_assistant
cd /home/container/ai_assistant
wget -O aistart.py "https://yourserver.com/aistart.py"
wget -O index.html "https://yourserver.com/index.html"
systemctl daemon-reload
systemctl enable ai_auth.service
systemctl start ai_auth.service

variables.name: AI Chat URL
variables.description: URL where the AI chat interface is hosted

variables.name: AI WebSockets URL
variables.description: WebSocket URL for real-time AI chat
